NK010(tha)033:1: khro mchog rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum dang //
NK010(tha)033:2: khro bcu yab yum khra thabs sgo ma bzhi //
NK010(tha)033:3: phur srung dam can dregs pa'i tshogs dang bcas //
NK010(tha)033:4: phrin las rdo rje phur pa'i sogs kha bsgyur /
NK010(tha)033:5: badz+ra ki li k+ai la pa ra tsakra h+r+ai sh+ti
NK010(tha)033:6: a pa na ya pha rol byad ma'i rbod zor
NK010(tha)033:7: ram sarba zlog zlog ya gnod byed rbad 'dre rbod
